MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA15 postcode area of Greenock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:39am. Our engineers are onsite on Strone Crescent and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:35am on 18th February 2021
